title: We Need more Orange Essence and Blue Essence
body:
Currently at the moment it's kinda roulette with 5 bullets loaded in a revolver for these incomes 
I get a box, I get a skin shard of a 975 RP skin, that's not bad, but it takes 675 OE to unlock it, 1050 OE to unlock a epic skin
750 RP skins go for - 150 OE
975 RP skins go for - 195 OE
1350 RP skins go for - 270 OE
It ends up taking forever. I know "Oh but it's free why are you complaining" I'm complaining cause, I earned those from playing good/I Bought those chests. My suggestion to make OE income more profitable would be to, Make them disenchant for more, or make it where you have to wait less to get another ready chest, or make skin shards cheaper. Cause when you get a reward you have to work for even though it says it's a reward is kinda dumb
 
Now on to Blue Essence. It's way too slow, you level up but sometimes you get poor champions that go for 90 essence
and it just is a real kick in the back to players that don't want to play every waking minute of the day just to grind levels for BE.
I'd say a guaranteed 3150 champion to disenchant for 630 BE, or have it where it gives you BE based on how many games you played to level up/ what they were, how long they were. Kinda like IP.

Idk i guess i'm kinda running my mouth with ideas that either don't make sense or have a lot of holes in it. Feel free to tell me your ideas and correct me in the comments.

replies.body: It's really dumb that getting ride of a skin gives so little orange essence, but the skins cost so much. And buying a champion through its shard isn't that great either because you only save what, 1k essence? It's mostly a problem for me because I haven't got a skin in my chests for months now. I don't mind it too much because I don't own all the champions. And I'm trying not to complain about free stuff. It just doesn't make all that much sense to me? Why create a system that we can't really use. It's a great system so let us use it!

But to be fair, it is the premium currency of the game, it isn't intended to be easy to get a skin from it. I see it as a way to incentivize plaers to use RP to buy more chests, to bypass the "buy one once every 4 month" system

I know, I'm not trying to complain too harshly or be ungrateful. But maybe if there was a way to buy Orange essence? I just dont want to buy a chest that has a small chance of containing something i can disenchant for it. At that point i might as well buy the skin :/ RNG within RNG within RNG
